name: Sister's Homecoming
description:
Play as Phaedra, a girl hungry for revenge. She spent years on the run, honing her skills to confront her brother who shunned her and stole her position as master of Snowfox Valley.

My main focus on the game was to find various ways of using sacrifice as a core function in combat. I used a part of my upcoming game Trials of Proelium to speed up the map design process so I could focus primarily on the gameplay mechanics and story.

My game Trials of Proelium can be found here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1749020/Trials_of_Proelium/

Interested in my work? Check out my discord and ko-fi here:
https://discord.gg/veB6fjPycS
https://ko-fi.com/retroactivefort
